<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Novo funcionario">ceeda52a97ffbd10489d747e6253af27</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>AtualizaAssingTo</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   if (state == "3") {
		g_form.setValue("assigned_to", g_user.userID);
	}else{
		g_form.setValue("assigned_to", "");
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-21 07:45:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fd1648fa97bbfd10489d747e6253afe4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AtualizaAssingTo</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Novos funcionários" source="x_1173448_novos_0">440cf822973fbd10489d747e6253af14</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Novos funcionários">440cf822973fbd10489d747e6253af14</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_fd1648fa97bbfd10489d747e6253afe4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-21 07:45:08</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
